description_top: Collection of Averroës' commentaries on Aristotle
title: Collection of Averroës' commentaries on Aristotle
author: Averroës
description: Contents: Middle commentary on Aristotle's Physics (ff. 1r-94(iii)v and 141v-143v). Middle commentary on Aristotle's De anima (ff. 95v-141r). Middle commentary on Aristotle's De generatione et corruptione (ff. 144v-179v).
